query:
INSERT INTO courses (
  title,
  description,
  level,
  framework,
  regionId,
  durationHours,
  price,
  stripePriceId,
  price3Month,
  stripePriceId3Month,
  price6Month,
  stripePriceId6Month,
  price12Month,
  stripePriceId12Month,
  modules,
  active
) VALUES (
  'ISO 42001 AI Management System Fundamentals',
  'Comprehensive training on ISO/IEC 42001:2023 - the world''s first international standard for AI management systems. Learn to implement an AIMS, manage AI risks, and prepare for certification. Covers all 10 clauses, PDCA methodology, and alignment with EU AI Act and NIST AI RMF.',
  'fundamentals',
  'iso_42001',
  1,
  20,
  49900,
  'price_1SiC1iDuEg5HakgP4kjwgoLh',
  19900,
  'price_1SiC1iDuEg5HakgP4vp96SKP',
  9900,
  'price_1SiC1jDuEg5HakgPRMXzNwXM',
  5900,
  'price_1SiC1jDuEg5HakgPxse0Tmcp',
  JSON_ARRAY(
    JSON_OBJECT('title', 'Introduction to ISO 42001', 'description', 'Understand the history, purpose, and structure of ISO 42001. Learn why AI governance requires a dedicated management system standard and how ISO 42001 aligns with other frameworks.', 'duration', 150),
    JSON_OBJECT('title', 'Context of the Organization (Clause 4)', 'description', 'Identify internal and external issues affecting the AIMS. Determine interested parties and their requirements. Define the scope of an AIMS.', 'duration', 150),
    JSON_OBJECT('title', 'Leadership and Governance (Clause 5)', 'description', 'Explain leadership responsibilities in AIMS. Develop an AI policy statement. Define organizational roles and responsibilities. Establish governance structures for AI.', 'duration', 150),
    JSON_OBJECT('title', 'Planning and Risk Assessment (Clause 6)', 'description', 'Conduct AI risk assessments. Set AI objectives aligned with organizational goals. Perform AI system impact assessments. Plan actions to address risks and opportunities.', 'duration', 180),
    JSON_OBJECT('title', 'Support and Resources (Clause 7)', 'description', 'Identify resource requirements for AIMS. Ensure competence and awareness of personnel. Establish communication processes. Manage documented information.', 'duration', 150),
    JSON_OBJECT('title', 'Operation and AI System Lifecycle (Clause 8)', 'description', 'Implement operational controls for AI systems. Manage the AI system lifecycle. Ensure data governance and quality. Oversee third-party AI relationships.', 'duration', 180),
    JSON_OBJECT('title', 'Performance Evaluation (Clause 9)', 'description', 'Monitor and measure AIMS performance. Conduct internal AIMS audits. Perform management reviews. Analyze and evaluate AI system performance.', 'duration', 150),
    JSON_OBJECT('title', 'Improvement and Certification (Clause 10)', 'description', 'Implement continual improvement processes. Handle nonconformities and corrective actions. Prepare for ISO 42001 certification. Understand the certification audit process.', 'duration', 150)
  ),
  true
);
